title: Complete System
description: Everything you need to compete online. New website plus all automation systems working together seamlessly.

hero.headline: Everything Working Together
hero.subheadline: Get a complete online presence with all systems connected and automated. The smart way to transform your business.

features.title: Professional Website
features.description: A complete 5-7 page website that showcases your business and generates leads.

features.title: Lead Automation
features.description: Every inquiry gets instant response. Never miss another opportunity.

features.title: Appointment System
features.description: Online booking with automatic reminders and follow-ups.

features.title: Review Management
features.description: Build your reputation on autopilot with smart review requests.

features.title: Integrated Systems
features.description: Everything works together seamlessly. One system, no headaches.

features.title: Complete Training
features.description: I'll show you how to use everything. Most clients are experts in 2 hours.

process.title: Strategic Planning
process.description: We map out your entire customer journey and identify automation opportunities.

process.title: Website Development
process.description: Build your custom website with all automation hooks in place.

process.title: Automation Setup
process.description: Connect all systems and test every automation pathway.

process.title: Launch & Training
process.description: Everything goes live and you get comprehensive training on your new system.

faq.question: Why is this better than doing them separately?
faq.answer: When built together, everything integrates perfectly from day one. Plus, you save $594 versus buying separately.

faq.question: Is this overwhelming to manage?
faq.answer: Actually, it's simpler! One dashboard, one system, everything in one place. I'll train you on everything.

faq.question: What kind of results can I expect?
faq.answer: Most clients see 2-3x more leads within 60 days, plus save 10+ hours per week on manual tasks.
